thread.title: GAME ON: Roger Stone tells Sen. McCain he’s ready to testify under oath about Russia/2016 election
thread.title_full: GAME ON: Roger Stone tells Sen. McCain he’s ready to testify under oath about Russia/2016 election

author: Greg P.
title: GAME ON: Roger Stone tells Sen. McCain he’s ready to testify under oath about Russia/2016 election
text:
GAME ON: Roger Stone tells Sen. McCain he’s ready to testify under oath about Russia/2016 election Posted at 11:33 am on March 15, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Be careful what you wish for? 
On Sunday, Sen. John McCain told Jake Tapper that he wants “Trump confidant” Roger Stone to testify in the Senate regarding his possible connections to WikiLeaks, Russia and the 2016 election: . @SenJohnMcCain : Trump confidant Roger Stone needs to testify in the Senate. #CNNsotu https://t.co/nscq3ItPjV 
— Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) March 12, 2017 Trending Wait for it! Michelle Malkin predicts #NextMaddowBombshell about Trump 
Roger Stone answered McCain in an Instagram video on Tuesday, while dressed as Hunter Thompson no less: 
“Hi I’m Roger Stone. Sen. John McCain says I should be compelled to testify in front of the U.S. Senate about quote, ‘my ties to Russians or Yanukovych.’ I assume he means former Ukrainian President Yanukovych. He is acting more like Sen. Joe McCarthy than Sen. John McCain. Because I have ties to neither Russians or the Russian state or Viktor Yanukovych in any way. I’m anxious to have these hearings. I’m ready to be sworn and I insist that the hearings be held in public. See you there, Johnny Mac.” 
Watch: A post shared by Roger Stone (@rogerjstonejr) on Mar 14, 2017 at 7:22pm PDT 
Game on.
